home.title: Take part in our raffle competitions!
home.description: Win exceptional prizes, including luxury cars and high-end watches. Participation is simple and transparent: buy your tickets, enter the draw, and increase your chances with every ticket you purchase. Each competition offers a limited number of tickets per participant, ensuring a fair and exciting experience for everyone.

1.subtitle: Select the Competition:
1.description: Enter the competition you want to participate and win.

2.subtitle: Choose how many tickets:
2.description: Decide how many tickets to buy in order to enter (each ticket has a maximum number per user).

3.subtitle: Increase Your Chances:
3.description: More tickets = higher odds in the final draw.

4.subtitle: Submit Your Entry:
4.description: Confirm your selection and secure your spot in the draw.

section-1.title: Select the Competition
section-1.1: Check the current competitions that are available
section-1.2: Choose the competition you want to participate in.

section-2.title: Buy Your Tickets
section-2.1: Each item has a maximum ticket limit per player.
section-2.2: Enter the number of tickets you wish to purchase.

section-3.1: Confirm your ticket selection with your e-mail to check the eligibility

section-4.title: Understand Your Chances
section-4.1: Every ticket increases your chance in the final draw.
section-4.2: Purchasing more tickets improves your odds.

terms.introduction: By accessing, registering, or participating in any competition, raffle, or ticket-based promotion operated by Lucky Money, you agree to be legally bound by these Terms and Conditions.

eligibility.title: 1. Eligibility
points: Participants must be at least 18 years old or the legal age of majority in their jurisdiction.
Participants must reside in a jurisdiction where such competitions are legally permitted.
All registration information must be accurate and truthful.
Lucky Money reserves the right to verify identity before awarding any prize.
Failure to meet eligibility requirements may result in disqualification without refund.

participation.title: 2. Participation & Ticket Limits
points: Each competition specifies maximum tickets per participant, total ticket allocation, and entry closing date.
Ticket limits apply per individual person, not per account.
Purchasing more tickets increases probability of selection but does not guarantee winning.
All ticket purchases are final unless a competition is canceled.

antiFraud.title: 3. Anti-Fraud & Fair Use Policy
antiFraud.intro: The following actions are strictly prohibited:
prohibited: Creating multiple accounts to bypass ticket limits.
Using different email addresses, identities, payment methods, devices, or IP addresses to exceed per-person limits.
Using bots, scripts, automation tools, or software manipulation.
Payment fraud, chargebacks, or unauthorized transactions.
antiFraud.consequencesTitle: If fraudulent activity is detected, Lucky Money reserves the right to:
consequences: Void all associated tickets with or without refund.
Report activity to authorities where applicable.

drawProcess.title: 4. Draw Process & Winner Selection
points: Winners are selected through a transparent and random draw process.
Draws occur once ticket sales close or maximum allocation is reached.
Winners will be notified using registered contact information.
If a winner fails to respond within {{responseDays}} days, a redraw may occur.
Identity verification may be required before prize release.

prizes.title: 5. Prizes
points: Prizes are described accurately to the best of our ability.
Images are for illustrative purposes only.
Lucky Money reserves the right to substitute a prize with one of equal or greater value.
Prizes are non-transferable and non-exchangeable unless otherwise stated.
Winners are responsible for applicable taxes, registration fees, or legal compliance requirements.

responsibleParticipation.title: 6. Responsible Participation
points: Participants must not purchase tickets beyond their financial means.
Participation does not guarantee winning.
Users are solely responsible for their spending decisions.
Lucky Money may impose spending limits or suspend accounts to protect users.

payments.title: 7. Payments, AML & Chargebacks
points: All payments must be made through approved payment processors.
Lucky Money reserves the right to conduct anti-money laundering and fraud screening.
Unjustified chargebacks may result in permanent suspension.
Suspicious financial activity may be reported to regulatory authorities.

accountTermination.title: 8. Account Suspension & Termination
points: Accounts may be suspended or terminated for breach of these Terms.
Fraudulent behavior or regulatory compliance concerns may result in termination.
Termination decisions are made at Lucky Money's sole discretion.

intellectualProperty.title: 9. Intellectual Property
points: All website content, branding, logos, graphics, and competition materials are the exclusive property of Lucky Money.
Content may not be copied, reproduced, or distributed without written consent.

publicity.title: 10. Publicity Rights
points: By accepting a prize, winners agree that Lucky Money may publish their first name and location.
Photographs or videos may be used for promotional purposes unless prohibited by law.

dataCollected.title: 11.1 Information Collected
points: Name
Email address
Date of birth
Payment details

dataUsage.title: 11.2 How We Use Data
points: To process ticket purchases.
To conduct identity verification.
To prevent fraud.
To communicate competition updates.
To improve platform security.

dataSharing.title: 11.3 Data Sharing
points: We do not sell personal data.
Data may be shared with payment processors and fraud prevention services.
Information may be shared with authorities when legally required.

dataSecurity.title: 11.4 Data Security
points: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect personal data.

userRights.title: 11.5 User Rights
points: Right to access personal data.
Right to correct inaccurate data.
Right to request deletion where legally permitted.
Right to restrict or object to processing.

liability.title: 12. Limitation of Liability
points: Lucky Money is not responsible for technical failures or service interruptions.
We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.
Participation is at the user's own risk.

modifications.title: 13. Modifications
points: Lucky Money reserves the right to modify competitions or these Terms at any time.
Continued participation after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

governingLaw.title: 14. Governing Law & Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Spain. Disputes shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of that jurisdiction.
